properties.name: ReplicationGroupId
properties.description: Regionally unique identifier for the member i.e. ReplicationGroupId.

type.description: Regionally unique identifier for the member i.e. ReplicationGroupId.

properties.name: ReplicationGroupRegion
properties.description: The AWS region of the Global Datastore member.

type.description: The AWS region of the Global Datastore member.

properties.name: Role
properties.description: Indicates the role of the member, primary or secondary.

type.description: Indicates the role of the member, primary or secondary.

properties.name: NodeGroupId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the Node Group. This is either auto-generated by ElastiCache (4-digit id) or a user supplied id.

type.description: Unique identifier for the Node Group. This is either auto-generated by ElastiCache (4-digit id) or a user supplied id.

properties.name: PreferredAvailabilityZones
properties.description: A list of preferred availability zones for the nodes of new node groups.

type.description: A list of preferred availability zones for the nodes of new node groups.

properties.name: ReplicationGroupId
properties.description: The replication group id of the Global Datastore member.

type.description: The replication group id of the Global Datastore member.

properties.name: ReplicationGroupRegion
properties.description: The AWS region of the Global Datastore member.

type.description: The AWS region of the Global Datastore member.

properties.name: ReshardingConfigurations
properties.description: A list of PreferredAvailabilityZones objects that specifies the configuration of a node group in the resharded cluster.

type.description: A list of PreferredAvailabilityZones objects that specifies the configuration of a node group in the resharded cluster.

resource.description: The AWS::ElastiCache::GlobalReplicationGroup resource creates an Amazon ElastiCache Global Replication Group.

properties.name: GlobalReplicationGroupIdSuffix
properties.description: The suffix name of a Global Datastore. Amazon ElastiCache automatically applies a prefix to the Global Datastore ID when it is created. Each AWS Region has its own prefix.

type.description: The suffix name of a Global Datastore. Amazon ElastiCache automatically applies a prefix to the Global Datastore ID when it is created. Each AWS Region has its own prefix.

properties.name: CacheNodeType
properties.description: The cache node type of the Global Datastore

type.description: The cache node type of the Global Datastore

properties.name: EngineVersion
properties.description: The engine version of the Global Datastore.

type.description: The engine version of the Global Datastore.

properties.name: CacheParameterGroupName
properties.description: Cache parameter group name to use for the new engine version. This parameter cannot be modified independently.

type.description: Cache parameter group name to use for the new engine version. This parameter cannot be modified independently.

properties.name: GlobalNodeGroupCount
properties.description: Indicates the number of node groups in the Global Datastore.

type.description: Indicates the number of node groups in the Global Datastore.

properties.name: GlobalReplicationGroupDescription
properties.description: The optional description of the Global Datastore

type.description: The optional description of the Global Datastore

properties.name: Members
properties.description: The replication groups that comprise the Global Datastore.

type.description: The replication groups that comprise the Global Datastore.

properties.name: RegionalConfigurations
properties.description: Describes the replication group IDs, the AWS regions where they are stored and the shard configuration for each that comprise the Global Datastore

type.description: Describes the replication group IDs, the AWS regions where they are stored and the shard configuration for each that comprise the Global Datastore

attributes.description: The AWS::ElastiCache::GlobalReplicationGroup resource creates an Amazon ElastiCache Global Replication Group.

properties.name: GlobalReplicationGroupId
properties.description: The name of the Global Datastore, it is generated by ElastiCache adding a prefix to GlobalReplicationGroupIdSuffix.

type.description: The name of the Global Datastore, it is generated by ElastiCache adding a prefix to GlobalReplicationGroupIdSuffix.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the Global Datastore

type.description: The status of the Global Datastore
